00069 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::init(){
00070   userName="";
00071   userPwd="";
00072   mInputMgr=NULL;
00073 
00074   initOgre();
00075   initCEGUI();
00076   initStates();

00098 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::quit() {

00111 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::run() {
00112   if (m_running){
00113 
00114      LOGI("Setting the GuiFrameListener");
00115     
00116     mFrameListener= new GuiFrameListener(mWindow, mCamera, mGUIRenderer);
00117     Ogre::Root::getSingleton().addFrameListener(mFrameListener);
00118     
00119     
00120     
00121     try {
00122       LOGI("starting rendering");
00123       Ogre::Root::getSingleton().startRendering();
00124     } 
00125     catch( Ogre::Exception& e ) {
00126 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32 
00127       MessageBox( NULL, e.getFullDescription().c_str(), 
00128                   "An exception has occured!", 
00129                   MB_OK | MB_ICONERROR | MB_TASKMODAL);
00130 #else
00131       std::string err= "An exception has occured: ";
00132       err+= e.getFullDescription().c_str();
00133       LOGE(err.c_str());
00134 #endif
00135     }
00136   }
00137 
00138   LOGI("GameEngine::run ended");
00139 }

00145 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::initStates() {
00146   LOGI("Initializing Game states...");
00147 
00148   GameState *gs1=new gsMainMenu();
00149   gs1->init();
00150 
00151   GameState *gs2=new gsLocalTest();
00152   gs2->init();
00153 
00154   states.push_back(gs1);
00155   states.push_back(gs2);
00156 
00157 }

00163 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::changeState(tStateType t){
00164   if (m_running){
00165 
00166     switch (t){
00167     case ST_MAIN_MENU:
00168       LOGI("Switching to MainMenu Game...");
00169       break;
00170     case ST_LOCAL_TEST:
00171       LOGI("Switching to LocalTest...");
00172       break;
00173     default:
00174       LOGW("Unknown game state received");
00175     }
00176 
00177     if ((unsigned int)t>states.size()){
00178       LOGE("An error will occured : we are calling a non-inexisting "
00179            "gamestate");
00180     }
00181     else{
00182       tGameStateType oldType=states[actualState]->getStateType();
00183       tGameStateType newType=states[t]->getStateType();
00184       if (oldType!=newType){
00185         if (oldType==GST_MENU){
00186           if (newType==GST_GAME){
00187             this->fromMenuToGame(states[actualState], states[t]);
00188           }
00189         }
00190       }
00191 
00192       actualState=t;
00193     }
00194   }
00195 }

00218 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::cleanStates(){
00219   LOGI("  Cleaning up GameStates...");
00220   // delete all states
00221   for (unsigned int indx = 0; indx < states.size(); indx++){
00222     states[indx]->cleanup();
00223     delete states[indx];
00224   } 
00225 
00226   actualState=-1;
00227   states.clear();
00228 }

00254 bool RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::connectUser(const char* user, 
00255                                                const char* pwd ){
00256   LOGI("Trying to connect a user");
00257 
00258   ClientConnect cc(user, pwd);
00259 
00260   tClientConnectReturn ret=cc.getResponse();
00261 
00262   const char* errMsg;
00263 
00264   switch(ret){
00265   case CCR_INEXISTANT_USER: 
00266     errMsg="This user does not exist.\nPlease create an account";
00267     break;
00268   case CCR_WRONG_PWD:
00269     errMsg="Wrong password.";
00270     break;
00271   case CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED:
00272     errMsg="Your email was not yet validated.";
00273      break;
00274   case CCR_BLACKLIST:
00275     errMsg="Your in blacklist.";
00276     break;
00277   case CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR:
00278     errMsg="An unknown error occured.";
00279     break;
00280   case CCR_SUCCESS:
00281     errMsg="";
00282     break;
00283   }
00284 
00285   if (ret!=CCR_SUCCESS){
00286     LOGW("The login of this user failed");
00287     //    guiEnv->addMessageBox (L"Connection failed", errMsg.c_str());
00288     return false;
00289 
00290   }
00291   else{
00292     LOGI("The login is successfull");
00293     userName=user;
00294     userPwd=pwd;
00295 
00296     return true;
00297   }
00298 }

00307 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::setRender(const char* rName){
00308   LOGI("Setting renderer :");
00309   LOGCATS("Renderer name :");
00310   LOGCATS(rName);
00311   LOGCAT();
00312 
00313   bool found=false;
00314   const char* name;
00315 
00316   // No Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystemByName(rName) function !
00317   Ogre::RenderSystemList::iterator listIt;
00318   Ogre::RenderSystem* item;
00319 
00320   Ogre::RenderSystemList* list=Ogre::Root::getSingleton().
00321     getAvailableRenderers();
00322 
00323 
00324   // Adds the render name to the hold browser
00325   for( listIt= list->begin(); listIt!= list->end(); listIt++){
00326     item=*listIt;
00327     name=item->getName().c_str();
00328     // We have the good Render system
00329     if (strcmp(name, rName)==0){
00330       found=true;
00331       Ogre::Root::getSingleton().setRenderSystem(item);
00332     }
00333   }
00334 
00335   if (!found){
00336     LOGE("No driver found");
00337   }
00338 }

00344 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::initOgre(){
00345   if (!Ogre::Root::getSingleton().restoreConfig())
00346     LOGE("The Ogre configuration cannot be restored");
00347 
00348   // True for autocreate window
00349   Ogre::Root::getSingleton().initialise(false, "RainbruRPG blah");
00350 
00351   // It seems to avoid the 'GLX_icon.png not found' Exception
00352   // as the setupResources() and loadResources() functions are
00353   // called later
00354   GlobalURI gu;
00355   std::string dataPath=gu.getShareFile("data");
00356   Ogre::Root::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(dataPath, "FileSystem");
00357 
00358   mWindow=Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystem()
00359     ->createRenderWindow("RainbruRPG2", 640, 480, false);
00360   
00361   initOIS();
00362 
00363   if (!mWindow){
00364     LOGE("The Ogre::Root cannot be initalized");
00365   }
00366 
00367   // Added for Ogre v1.2 to avoid crashes due to uninitialized materials,
00368   // Techniques and passes
00369   MaterialManager::getSingleton().initialise();
00370 
00371   setupResources();
00372   loadResources();
00373 
00374   logSceneMgrList();
00375   chooseSceneManager();
00376   createCamera();
00377   createViewports();
00378 
00379   // Set default mipmap level (NB some APIs ignore this)
00380   TextureManager::getSingleton().setDefaultNumMipmaps(5);
00381 
00382 
00383   GuiManager::getSingleton().createNumDebugWindow(mWindow);
00384   GuiManager::getSingleton().createTitleOverlay(mWindow);
00385   
00386 }

00393 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::initCEGUI(){
00394   // Set up GUI system
00395   LOGI("Initializing CEGUI");
00396 
00397   // true for rendering CEGUI last, with false, CEGUI windows are not
00398   // over OGRE overlays (they are hidden)
00399   mGUIRenderer = new CEGUI::OgreCEGUIRenderer(mWindow, 
00400                                               Ogre::RENDER_QUEUE_OVERLAY, 
00401                                               true, 3000, mSceneMgr);
00402 
00403   mGUISystem = new CEGUI::System(mGUIRenderer, NULL, NULL, 
00404                                  NULL, "", (CEGUI::utf8*)"cegui.log");
00405 
00406   CEGUI::SchemeManager::getSingleton().
00407     loadScheme((CEGUI::utf8*)"TaharezLook.scheme");
00408   CEGUI::SchemeManager::getSingleton().
00409     loadScheme((CEGUI::utf8*)"VanillaSkin.scheme");
00410   mGUISystem->setDefaultMouseCursor((CEGUI::utf8*)"TaharezLook", 
00411                                     (CEGUI::utf8*)"MouseArrow");
00412   
00413   // load in a font.  The first font loaded automatically becomes 
00414   //the default font.
00415   CEGUI::FontManager::getSingleton()
00416     .createFont((CEGUI::utf8*)"fkp-16.font");
00417   CEGUI::FontManager::getSingleton()
00418     .createFont((CEGUI::utf8*)"iconified-20.font");
00419 
00420   CEGUI::MouseCursor::getSingleton().setImage("TaharezLook", 
00421                                               "MouseMoveCursor");
00422      
00423 }
00424 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::chooseSceneManager(){
00429   LOGI("chooseSceneManager");
00430   // Get the SceneManager, in this case a generic one
00431   mSceneMgr = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().
00432     createSceneManager("DefaultSceneManager" );
00433 
00434   // Set ambient light
00435   mSceneMgr->setAmbientLight(ColourValue(0.5, 0.5, 0.5));
00436 }

00442 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::createCamera(){
00443   LOGI("createCamera");
00444 
00445   // Create the camera
00446   mCamera = mSceneMgr->createCamera("PlayerCam");
00447   
00448   // Position it at 500 in Z direction
00449   //  mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(0,0,500));
00450   // Look back along -Z
00451   //  mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,0,-300));
00452   mCamera->setNearClipDistance(5);
00453 }

00459 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::createViewports(){
00460   LOGI("createViewports");
00461 
00462   // Create one viewport, entire window
00463   if (mWindow){
00464     Viewport* vp = mWindow->addViewport(mCamera);
00465     vp->setBackgroundColour(ColourValue(0,0,0));
00466     
00467     // Alter the camera aspect ratio to match the viewport
00468     mCamera->setAspectRatio(
00469       Real(vp->getActualWidth()) / Real(vp->getActualHeight()));
00470   }
00471   else{
00472     LOGE("Invalid OgreWindow");
00473   }
00474 }

00482 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::setupResources(){
00483   LOGI("Setting up Resources");
00484 
00485   // Get the filename according to the installation prefix
00486   Network::GlobalURI gu;
00487   std::string resCfg=gu.getShareFile("config/resources.cfg");
00488 
00489   // Load resource paths from config file
00490   ConfigFile cf;
00491   cf.load(resCfg);
00492   
00493   // Go through all sections & settings in the file
00494   ConfigFile::SectionIterator seci = cf.getSectionIterator();
00495   
00496   String secName, typeName, archName, shareArchName;
00497 
00498   while (seci.hasMoreElements()){
00499     secName = seci.peekNextKey();
00500     ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap *settings = seci.getNext();
00501     ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap::iterator i;
00502     for (i = settings->begin(); i != settings->end(); ++i){
00503       typeName = i->first;
00504       archName = i->second;
00505       shareArchName= gu.getShareFile(archName);
00506 
00507       // Logging
00508       LOGCATS("secName :");
00509       LOGCATS(secName.c_str());
00510       LOGCATS(" typeName :");
00511       LOGCATS(typeName.c_str());
00512       LOGCATS(" archName :");
00513       LOGCATS(shareArchName.c_str());
00514       LOGCAT();
00515 
00516       ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().
00517         addResourceLocation( shareArchName, typeName, secName);
00518     }
00519   }
00520 
00521   LOGI("All resources correctly setup");
00522 
00523 }

00531 CEGUI::MouseButton RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::
00532 convertOgreButtonToCegui(int buttonID){
00533    switch (buttonID)   {
00534    case MouseEvent::BUTTON0_MASK:
00535        return CEGUI::LeftButton;
00536    case MouseEvent::BUTTON1_MASK:
00537        return CEGUI::RightButton;
00538    case MouseEvent::BUTTON2_MASK:
00539        return CEGUI::MiddleButton;
00540    case MouseEvent::BUTTON3_MASK:
00541        return CEGUI::X1Button;
00542    default:
00543        return CEGUI::LeftButton;
00544    }
00545 }

00588 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::logSceneMgrList(){
00589   LOGI("Logging available scene manager");
00590 
00591   SceneManagerEnumerator::MetaDataIterator it = Ogre::Root::getSingleton()
00592     .getSceneManagerMetaDataIterator();
00593 
00594 
00595   while (it.hasMoreElements ()){
00596     const SceneManagerMetaData* metaData = it.getNext ();
00597 
00598     LOGCATS(metaData->typeName.c_str());
00599     LOGCAT();
00600   } 
00601 }

00609 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::loadResources(void){
00610   LOGI("Loading all resources");
00611 
00612   // Get a vector of groups
00613   StringVector sv=ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().getResourceGroups();
00614   unsigned int indx;
00615   for (indx = 0; indx < sv.size(); indx++){
00616     loadResourcesGroup(sv[indx]);
00617   }
00618 
00619   // Initialise, parse scripts etc
00620   //  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseAllResourceGroups();
00621   LOGI("All resources loaded");
00622 }
00623 
00629 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::
00630 loadResourcesGroup(const Ogre::String& groupName){
00631     LOGCATS("Loading resource group : ");
00632     LOGCATS(groupName.c_str());
00633     LOGCAT();
00634 
00635     Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::ResourceDeclarationList::iterator iter;
00636 
00637     Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::ResourceDeclarationList rdl=
00638       ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton()
00639       .getResourceDeclarationList(groupName);
00640 
00641 
00642     for (iter=rdl.begin(); iter != rdl.end(); iter++){
00643       LOGCATS("Loading ressource ");
00644       LOGCATS((*iter).resourceName.c_str());
00645       LOGCAT();
00646     }
00647 
00648     ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseResourceGroup(groupName);
00649 }

00656 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::
00657 fromMenuToGame(GameState* from, GameState* to){
00658   LOGI("Switching from menuType to gameType");
00659   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeOut();
00660 
00661   // We must wait for the CEGUI fade end to prevent
00662   // SEGFAULT in access to CEGUI windows (getAlpha())
00663   while (GuiManager::getSingleton().isInGuiFadeOut()){
00664     Ogre::Root::getSingleton().renderOneFrame();
00665   }
00666 
00667   GuiManager::getSingleton().removeCurrentCEGUILayout();
00668 
00669   LOGI("Clearing Scene");
00670   mSceneMgr->clearScene();
00671   mWindow->removeAllViewports();
00672   mSceneMgr->destroyAllCameras();
00673 
00674 
00675   LOGI("Setting new scene manager");
00676   mSceneMgr = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().
00677     createSceneManager("PagingLandScapeSceneManager"); 
00678 
00679   //  mSceneMgr->setShadowTechnique(SHADOWTYPE_NONE);
00680 
00681   //  addMesh("Tree", "MyPineTree.mesh");
00682 
00683   createCamera();
00684 
00685   //mettre a jour la camera de mFrameListener
00686   GuiFrameListener* gfl=(GuiFrameListener*)mFrameListener;
00687   gfl->setCamera(mCamera);
00688 
00689   //BaseCameraViewpoint.x=-4098.0f
00690   //BaseCameraViewpoint.y=30644.0f
00691   //BaseCameraViewpoint.z=293.0f
00692 
00693 
00694       mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(800,200,1200));
00695   //     mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(-4098,30644,293));
00696   mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,0,0));
00697 
00698   createViewports();
00699   GuiManager::getSingleton().detroyTitleOverlay();
00700 
00701   ColourValue fadeColour( 0.9, 0.9, 0.9 );
00702   //mSceneMgr->setFog( FOG_LINEAR, fadeColour, 0.0, 350, 515 );
00703   //mWindow->getViewport(0)->setBackgroundColour( fadeColour );
00704   mSceneMgr->setFog( FOG_EXP, fadeColour, 0.0002 );
00705   mSceneMgr->setWorldGeometry( "paginglandscape2.cfg" );
00706   //  addMesh("Cube", "Cube.mesh");
00707   mSceneMgr->setSkyDome( true, "Examples/CloudySky", 5, 8 );
00708 
00709   // Loads object list
00710   xmlObjectList xol;
00711 
00712   LOGI("LocalTest environment successfully initialized");
00713 }

00722 bool RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::keyPressed(const OIS::KeyEvent& evt){
00723   // ESC is quit
00724   OIS::KeyCode kc=evt.key;
00725   if (kc==OIS::KC_ESCAPE)
00726     this->quit();
00727   states[actualState]->keyPressed(evt);
00728 
00729   return true;
00730 }

00792 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::initOIS(){
00793   mInputMgr=InputManager::getSingletonPtr();
00794   mInputMgr->initialise(mWindow);
00795   mInputMgr->addKeyListener(this, "GameEngine");
00796   mInputMgr->addMouseListener(this, "GameEngine");

00807 void RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt){
00808   if (mInputMgr)
00809     mInputMgr->capture();
00810 
00811   states[actualState]->frameStarted(evt);
